short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for users of Assima Assist used to deliver the full functionalities offered by Assist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Assist browser extension enables the support of Assima Assist on Google Chrome.

Assima Assist delivers information and intelligent guidance to application users via a unique overlay that integrates seamlessly with the target application. The Assima Assist browser extension brings the Assist technology on Chrome browser for existing Assima users.

Note: This is not a standalone extension, it requires access to an Assima server.
